r.s: Abstraction of various SASL mechanism responses
r.d: Provides code to generate responses to common SASL mechanisms, including: - Digest-MD5 - CramMD5 - Plain - Anonymous - Login (Pseudo mechanism)
r.n: QA release * Move SVN to proper directory structure [cweiske] * Fix Bug #8775: Error in package.xml * Fix Bug #14671: Security issue due to seeding random number generator [cweiske]
